ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fires of Beltane burn bright as Jon and Tarot are crowned King and Queen of the May Day festivities. But the forest Troll Queen is also celebrating this fertility festival and orders her army to find a suitable King to mate with. Jon is captured and brought to the Queen! Can Tarot rescue Jon before he's made a royal sacrifice? Find out in this Issue entitled "Trouble with Trolls!"
